moon.core.instruction
Class CodeFragment

java.lang.Object
  moon.core.ObjectMoon
      moon.core.instruction.CodeFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class CodeFragment
extends ObjectMoon

Code fragment contained in a class. Usually a method body.

Since:
MOON-2.3.0
Author:
Raúl Marticorena
See Also:
ObjectMoon, ClassDef, MethDec, Serialized Form
